channel.title: I Srsly Need Help With Tons.....HELP!
channel.description:
Okay , Today i was trying out this source and i REALLY LIKE IT , but im having like tons of problems
1. This Is my Start up menu B4 u log in [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2zee1ky.png[/img] When i go over and try to change the background it still stays the same as the last background.
2.when you load it up , you see this [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/16jhq41.png[/img] when u click on that forum direct thing ( exilium forum) , it directs you to a website , how do i change it ( I Wanna add my own website link , but how do i change??
3. Whenever i click on this thing on the top left corner it goes on to another website , donation , bluh bluh , how do change all of those? [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/14o382c.png[/img]
4. Donaters Cant yell , but player and mods and admins can , LOOL? They also cant do ::Bank , i want that so they can use that as a future, but how :[]
5. Dice Works but whenever i try and roll in the FC or Clan Chat , i wield the dice , or whenever i do private it works fine , Can someone teach me to get those dice that roll in a fc or the ones that say it outloud , and mithril seeds dont plant.
6. When your ingame you can do ::donate and ::website , etc , how do i change those? and make it my own donation site + website.
7. When you go into the game i get this at the very start of the game , how do i change that. [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2i0u2ol.png[/img] 8. Aswell as this pop-up when u join. [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/8yi2s3.png[/img] 9.And this as the quest-tab , how do i change the website name typed in there , the owner thing aswell , and that part that says " refluxion : players online... " i wanna change it to " (myservername) : players online..." [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/20avrk2.png[/img]

item.title: I Srsly Need Help With Tons.....HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

3lv3n snip3r:

Oh boy… You can’t even change the name of the previous server and most leeched servers at least have the name changed. You should learn how to program with Java before attempting to code a game. It’s just like jumping into a large body of water and not knowing how to swim. ^.^

@ 3lv3n snip3r you sir are really smart…how do u think of this kind of stuff…

@ soul limitIf you cant change the name or change the background…You sir need to learn java and watch a lot of youtube

Read full topic
item.source: I Srsly Need Help With Tons.....HELP!

item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

go into settings.java for the forums, and what it says on the quest tab…I cant help u with all of this at once it will be confusing for u, add me on skype @ rspsdesigner

Read full topic

when u click on that forum direct thing ( exilium forum) , it directs you to a website , how do i change it ( I Wanna add my own website link , but how do i change??
